ai-sn50:1-12.1.3_0: The powers of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-sn50:1-12.1.5_0: The Ganges river slants, slopes, and inclines to the east.
ai-sn50:1-12.1.6_0: In the same way, a mendicant who develops and cultivates the five powers slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.
ai-sn50:1-12.1.7_0: And how does a mendicant who develops the five powers slant, slope, and incline to extinguishment?
ai-sn50:1-12.1.8_0: A mendicant develops the power of faith,
ai-sn50:1-12.1.12_0: and wisdom, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.
ai-sn50:1-12.1.13_0: That’s how a mendicant who develops and cultivates the five powers slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.”
ai-sn50:1-12.1.15_0: The first sub-chapter on the Ganges is finished.

ai-sn50:45-54.1.3_0: Desire for rebirth in the realm of luminous form, desire for rebirth in the formless realm, conceit, restlessness, and ignorance.
ai-sn50:45-54.1.4_0: These are the five higher fetters.
ai-sn50:45-54.1.5_0: The five powers should be developed for the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up of these five higher fetters.
ai-sn50:45-54.1.7_0: A mendicant develops the power of faith,
ai-sn50:45-54.1.11_0: and wisdom, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.
ai-sn50:45-54.1.12_0: These five powers should be developed for the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up of these five higher fetters.”
ai-sn50:55-66.1.1_0: “Mendicants, suppose that, although the Ganges river slants, slopes, and inclines to the east,
ai-sn50:55-66.1.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant who develops and cultivates the five powers slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.
ai-sn50:55-66.1.3_0: And how does a mendicant who develops the five powers slant, slope, and incline to extinguishment?
ai-sn50:55-66.1.4_0: It’s when a mendicant develops the powers of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom, which culminate in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-sn50:55-66.1.5_0: That’s how a mendicant who develops and cultivates the five powers slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.”
ai-sn50:55-66.1.8_0: The sixth sub-chapter on the Ganges is finished.

ai-sn50:67-76.1.1_0: (This text consists of the title only. To be expanded as in SN 45.139–148, removal of greed version.)
